person.name: Eduardo Gavarret
person.description: Elder Eduardo Gavarret was sustained a member of the First Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on April 5, 2008, at age 51. At the time of his call, he had been serving in the bishopric of the Santa Cruz Ward in Lima, Peru. He has served as a member of the Fourth Quorum of the Seventy, Brazil Area, from 1997 to 2000. From 2000 to 2010 he was a counselor in the South America Northwest Area Presidency. He currently serves as assistant Executive Director in the Missionary Department and he was a member of the Media, Information, and Communications Committee at Church headquarters.
